buildCommand: case $(pwd) in */packages/extension) cd ../.. && pnpm build && mkdir -p packages/extension/packages/web && cp -r packages/web/dist packages/extension/packages/web/dist ;; *) pnpm build ;; esac
installCommand: pwd && case $(pwd) in */packages/extension) cd ../.. && pnpm install && pnpm i @vercel/analytics -w ;; *) pnpm install && pnpm i @vercel/analytics -w ;; esac
